title: Caroline Cherie = Dear Caroline
abstract: Note: Adapted from the book by Cecil Saint-Laurent.
description: Caroline de Bievres celebrates her 16th birthday on 14 July 1789. While the Parisians storm the Bastille, Caroline experiences love with Gaston de Sallanches. Sent to Paris by her parents, she discovers that Gaston is already married.  Credits: Producer, Alain Poire, Paul Cadeac ; director, Richard Pottier ; writer, Jean Anouilh ; photography, Maurice Barry ; music, Georges Auric ; art director, Jacques Krauss. Cast: Martine Carol, Jacques Dacqmine, Pierre Cressoy, Jacques Clancy, Marie Dea, Daniele Seller, Paul Bernard, Alfred Adam, Raymond Souplex, Marthe Mercadier, Nadine Alari, Yvonne de Bray, Marie Dea, Olivier Hussenot.
